00022 #include <Selectors.hpp>

00024 namespace loos {
00025 
00026   bool CAlphaSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00027     return(pa->name() == "CA");
00028   }
00029 
00030   bool BackboneSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00031     std::string s = pa->name();
00032     return(s == "C" || s == "CA" || s == "O" || s == "N");
00033   }
00034 
00035   bool SegidSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00036     return(pa->segid() == str);
00037   }
00038 
00039   bool AtomNameSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00040     return(pa->name() == str);
00041   }
00042 
00043   bool ResidRangeSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00044     return(pa->resid() >= _low && pa->resid() <= _high);
00045   }
00046 
00047   
00048   bool ZSliceSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00049     greal z = (pa->coords()).z();
00050     return ( (z>=_min) && (z<_max) );
00051   }
00052 
00053   bool NotSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00054     return(!(sel(pa)));
00055   }
00056 
00057   bool HydrogenSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00058     bool masscheck = true;
00059 
00060     if (pa->checkProperty(Atom::massbit))
00061       masscheck = (pa->mass() < 1.1);
00062     
00063     std::string n = pa->name();
00064     return( (n[0] == 'H') && masscheck );
00065   }
00066 
00067   bool HeavyAtomSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00068     return (not_heavy(pa));
00069   }
00070 
00071 
00072   bool AndSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00073     return(lhs(pa) && rhs(pa));
00074   }
00075 
00076   bool OrSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00077     return(lhs(pa) || rhs(pa));
00078   }
00079 
00080 
00081   bool SolventSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00082     return(osel(pa));
00083   }
00084 
00085 
00086   bool HeavySolventSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00087     return(sel(pa));
00088   }
00089 
00090   bool KernelSelector::operator()(const pAtom& pa) const {
00091     krnl.execute(pa);
00092     if (krnl.stack().size() != 1) {
00093       throw(std::runtime_error("Execution error - unexpected values on stack"));
00094     }
00095     
00096     internal::Value results = krnl.stack().pop();
00097     if (results.type != internal::Value::INT)
00098       throw(std::runtime_error("Execution error - unexpected value on top of stack"));
00099     
00100     return(results.itg);
00101   }
00102
